title: Can Illaoi's E get the Thresh/Blitz hitbox treatment?
body: It's WAY too punishing when playing Illaoi and you miss your e, your damage drops dramatically. More or less, you'll probably end up dying if you miss it.

replies.body: Or you can learn to land your skillshot instead.
How is telling you to just land the skillshot instead of whining to make it broken being a dick?
